showcases.title: Geo Economic Simulator
showcases.description: A simulation of a global economy over time, with a focus on the relationship between GDP, population, and resource availability.

showcases.title: Retirement Planner
showcases.description: Learn how your future earnings (or lack thereof) impact your social security benefits

showcases.title: 3D Interactive PhotoCube
showcases.description: A WebGL-powered 3D photocube with interactive controls and animations.

showcases.title: FPS Photo Realm
showcases.description: Walk around through a WebGL rendered world built of your own Photos and Art

showcases.title: Sierpinski Generator
showcases.description: Learn how a series of random outcomes can generate a fractal pattern.

showcases.title: Multi 3D Interactive PhotoCubes
showcases.description: A WebGL-powered Array of 3D photocubes with interactive controls and animations.

showcases.title: Massive Tree Viewer
showcases.description: Interactive particle system with physics simulation using Canvas API.

showcases.title: Particle System
showcases.description: Interactive particle system with physics simulation using Canvas API.

showcases.title: GL Shaders
showcases.description: WebGL Shader Demonstration with lots of configurable tweaks to play with.

showcases.title: SVG Animation
showcases.description: Complex SVG animations with morphing and path animations.
